original_text: Haman said moreover, Yea, Esther the queen did let no man come in with the king unto the banquet that she had prepared but myself; and to morrow am I invited unto her also with the king.
korean_text: 또 하만이 이르되 왕후 에스더가 그 베푼 잔치에 왕과 함께 오기를 허락 받은 자는 나밖에 없었고 내일도 왕과 함께 청함을 받았느니라

sentences.original_text: did let no man come in with the king
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 왕과 함께 들어오게 하지 않았고

sentences.original_text: unto the banquet that she had prepared
and to morrow am I invited
unto her also with the king
